title: Tapping
alt: Sometimes the best fun looks like boredom.
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting at a desk, tapping various parts of it.]
Cueball: Hey, I can get different pitches by tapping on different parts of the desk.
Tap Tap
Tap Tap[Cueball starts tapping faster, with both hands.]
Cueball: Sweet, I can do the Jurassic park theme!
Tap Tap
Tap Tap
Tap Tap Tap[Cueball tap the desk very rapidly, legs crossed.]
Tap Tap Tap
Tap Tap Tap
Tap Tap
Tap Tap
Tap Tap
Tap Tap[Later, elsewhere.]
Megan: So, what did you do all afternoon?
Cueball: Hung out.
